title.ja: オンブレパウダーブロウマスター

description.en: Learn the most popular brow technique with soft, powdered finish
description.vi: Học kỹ thuật phun mày phổ biến nhất với hiệu ứng phấn mềm mại
description.ja: 柔らかいパウダー仕上げの最も人気のある眉毛テクニックを学ぶ
description.es: Aprende la técnica de cejas más popular con acabado suave y en polvo
description.ko: 부드러운 파우더 마감의 가장 인기 있는 눈썹 기술을 배우세요

subtitle: Perfect Soft Shading Technique
introduction: Master the ombre powder brow technique that creates soft, makeup-like results. Learn gradient shading, saturation control, and how to achieve consistent, beautiful results on every client.

curriculum.name: Machine Technique Fundamentals
curriculum.description: Proper machine handling, needle selection, and depth control

curriculum.name: Gradient Shading
curriculum.description: Create perfect ombre effect from light to dark

curriculum.name: Brow Mapping & Design
curriculum.description: Advanced brow shaping for different face types

curriculum.name: Live Model Practice
curriculum.description: Perform complete ombre brow procedures on live models
